lines.greetings_other: %PLAYER_NAME, my dear. I've been swamped with paperwork today. When do I get to join you in exploring the stars?
%PLAYER_NAME, my %PLAYER_NAME. The house's finances have been going as planned; you can count on me.
%PLAYER_NAME, my partner. I'm hoping that you're here to talk about how we bring down some of these bastards around us.
%PLAYER_NAME, my love. I hope that you are well. Be careful out there in your journeys.
Greetings %PLAYER_NAME, my liege. My fleet stands at the ready.
Greetings %PLAYER_NAME, my liege. Perfect timing, I had a list of proposals which I wish to discuss...
Greetings %PLAYER_NAME, my liege. Point me at someone and I will see them punished.
Greetings %PLAYER_NAME, my liege. What is your command?
Hail, %PLAYER_NAME. Remind me next time we're at the space bar, I've got story to tell about my new scar. Ha!
Hail, %PLAYER_NAME. Remind me next time we're at the space bar, I've got story to tell about my new scar. Ha!
Hail, %PLAYER_NAME. Spare me a minute, for you must tell me of your latest adventures!
Hail, %PLAYER_NAME. Spare me a minute, for you must tell me of your latest adventures!
Good hunting, %PLAYER_NAME. May your armor hold fast and your missiles strike true.
Speak quickly %PLAYER_NAME. I'd prefer to avoid the shame of being seen in your presence.
Speak quickly %PLAYER_NAME. I'd prefer to avoid the shame of being seen in your presence.
Your presence is acknowledged, %PLAYER_NAME. I advise you choose your words carefully if you don't want a bullet in the skull.
Your presence is acknowledged, %PLAYER_NAME. I advise you choose your words carefully if you don't want a bullet in the skull.
Good to see you, %PLAYER_NAME. Let us speak plainly.
Good to see you, %PLAYER_NAME. Let us speak plainly.
Good to see you, %PLAYER_NAME. What can I do for you today?
Good to see you, %PLAYER_NAME. What can I do for you today?
Greetings %PLAYER_NAME, what news can you share from your travels?
I suppose it would be prudent for me to entertain you, %PLAYER_NAME, however much I would rather not.
I suppose it would be prudent for me to entertain you, %PLAYER_NAME, however much I would rather not.
You best have something interesting to make it worth me suffering your presence, %PLAYER_NAME
You best have something interesting to make it worth me suffering your presence, %PLAYER_NAME
%PLAYER_NAME, just the person I wanted to see. You sure are a breath of fresh air compared to the rest of these bastards.
%PLAYER_NAME, just the person I wanted to see. You sure are a breath of fresh air compared to the rest of these bastards.
I'm pleasantly surprised that you haven't managed to get yourself killed yet, %PLAYER_NAME. Can't say I'm surprised at this point.
I'm pleasantly surprised that you haven't managed to get yourself killed yet, %PLAYER_NAME. Can't say I'm surprised at this point.
Well you caught me in a good mood, %PLAYER_NAME. What do you want?
%PLAYER_NAME, do yourself a favor and stay out of my way.
%PLAYER_NAME, do yourself a favor and stay out of my way.
Ah, %PLAYER_NAME, the snake dares to slither in the open. Convince me why I shouldn't open fire immediately.
Ah, %PLAYER_NAME, the snake dares to slither in the open. Convince me why I shouldn't open fire immediately.
%PLAYER_NAME, my dear friend. It is good to see you alive and well. What is it?
%PLAYER_NAME, my dear friend. It is good to see you alive and well. What is it?
%PLAYER_NAME, my friend. It is good to see you alive and well. What is it?
%PLAYER_NAME, my friend. It is good to see you alive and well. What is it?
Good day %PLAYER_NAME, I trust that you've conducted yourself honorably since our last meeting.
You are trying my patience, %PLAYER_NAME. Speak if you must.
You are trying my patience, %PLAYER_NAME. Speak if you must.
I have no need to speak to one of such low character as yourself, %PLAYER_NAME.
I have no need to speak to one of such low character as yourself, %PLAYER_NAME.

lines.greeting_feast: Fancy seeing you here, %PLAYER_NAME. Say, shall we join the tournament later?
lines.greetings_first: Well met! A fellow warrior I see; that fleet of yours definitely isn't just for show!
lines.greetings_hostile: %PLAYER_NAME! I've been waiting for the day that we might see which of us is the strongest. En garde!

lines.greeting_feast: Good evening %PLAYER_NAME. I must say I'm impressed at the generosity of our host. This decor can't have been cheap.
lines.greetings_first: Ah, yes. At last we meet. You seem like a good person to know. Let us speak together from time to time.
lines.greetings_hostile: I have you cornered, %PLAYER_NAME. Surrender or die!

lines.greeting_feast: Hey %PLAYER_NAME, can you believe the quality of the drinks here? I've found better wine in the cellar of a Luddic nun.
lines.greetings_first: I've heard of you. Well, I'm not one for bandying words, so if you have anything to say, out with it.
lines.greetings_hostile: You've caught me in a bad mood, %PLAYER_NAME. Turning your fleet to scrap metal might cheer me up though. Die!

lines.greeting_feast: Greetings %PLAYER_NAME. Let us put our troubles to the morrow, for tonight we will feast and make merry.
lines.greetings_first: Peace to you, and always remember to temper your valor with mercy, your courage with honor.
lines.greetings_hostile: %PLAYER_NAME! Stand down now, if not for your own sake, at least for the sake of your crew.

lines.current_task_desc_none: I am still considering my next assignment.
lines.current_task_desc_feast: I am attending a feast at %c0.
lines.current_task_desc_patrol: We are scouting for the enemy around %c0. I will guard the areas near my home.
lines.current_task_desc_collect_taxes: I am collecting taxes from my administered areas. It has been too long since I have returned home, and I must see to my demesne.
lines.current_task_desc_upgrade_fleet: I am upgrading my fleet at %c0. I will need additional firepower to deal with threats to the realm.
lines.current_task_desc_venture: I am headed on a business venture to %c0. This will yield additional funds for maintaining and expanding my fleet.
lines.current_task_desc_raid: I am raiding %c0. We must keep up the pressure and cripple the enemy's war effort.
lines.current_task_desc_defend: I am flying to the defense of %c0. I've received word of enemy activity in the area.
lines.current_task_desc_companion: I am serving as an officer in your fleet.
lines.current_task_desc_campaign: I am on campaign. The realm's navy is still being assembled.
lines.current_task_desc_campaign2: I am on campaign. Our current target is %c0.
lines.cant_start_tournament: Unfortunately, we need at least four lord sponsors in order to cover the organization fees and prize pool. Please check back later.
lines.confirm_start_tournament: Very well. If you're going to challenge me, I was looking for an excuse to brush up on my piloting skills anyway. I'll see you in the arena!
lines.dedicate_tournament: Oh my, I'm very touched that you were thinking of me.
lines.dedicate_tournament_again: Another tournament dedication? Well, I suppose it's always welcome...
lines.greeting_host_feast: Welcome to my estate, %PLAYER_NAME. You are under my protection here; please make yourself at home.
lines.greetings_first: (error) Nice to meet you. I am the one and only %LORD_NAME
lines.greetings_hostile: (error) Oh look here. Its the one and only idiot who dares to stand in my way!
lines.greetings_other: (error) Hello again %PLAYER_NAME
lines.option_ask_location: Ask about the location of someone.
lines.option_ask_quest: Ask if they have any tasks for you.
lines.option_ask_tournament: Ask to enter the feast tournament.
lines.option_dedicate_tournament: %LORD_NAME, my tournament victory goes out to you.
